extendedInfo.description: Join thousands of people rocking out to their favorite music. Grab this game because it'll make you feel good!Gameplay Powered by YOUR Music!Experience YOUR music collection as never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter. (Note: Music must be on SD card - Google cloud music is not possible at the moment)Blast away to your favorite tracks. Watch your firepower pulse to the energy of the music.â 100% - 'Must own for action gamers' - AppSpyâ 100% - 'Must Have' - Slide To Playâ 90% - 'Feel the beat!' - 148 Appsâ 90% - 'It'll blow up your screen' - Touch Arcadeâ Levels created from YOUR music collection (On SD card)â Play to internet radio stationsâ Simple 1 stick mode for beginnersâ Twin stick mode for the prosâ Boss Rush, Survival & Chill Out game modesâ Rank up and unlock 23 perksI'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@coldbeamgames.com, please include your device make and model.See FAQ for help on detecting music:http://www.coldbeamgames.com/android-music-faq.html

reviews.title: Best Game
reviews.comment: I play this on PC and now on the play store and I have not had any problem good quality, great performance, no lag and really worth the money to by it
reviews.author: Tomas Beckman

reviews.comment: One of the top android games to date with some of the most visualy stunning graphics on android with no lag whatsoever.\tOne of the top android games to date with some of the most visualy stunning graphics on android with no lag whatsoever.
reviews.author: Max Z

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: If you love music and fireworks, do yourself a favour and buy this game!!! I bought this game on steam at first, and it was just AWESOME and now on my phone, this game did not disappoint me. Believe me. This is the first time I ever would comment here and rate. This game is THAT good.
reviews.author: James Matthew Espina

reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!
reviews.comment: I Highly recommend this app for everyone, I would have to say it\'s the BEST game app on my-phone, it even beat out Glow-Hockey for me and that is hard to say!!!!!!!!!!!! OMG I am Addicted to this game like a Drug-Addict on heroine. Completely AWESOME!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Donovven Mattis

reviews.title: Brilliant game
reviews.comment: Best game I\'ve played on Android yet. Amazing graphics and smooth gameplay on Nexus 7 and Note 2. Can\'t wait to see this game on a big screen via Ouya!
reviews.author: Chris Melnick

reviews.title: Great taste in music/poor judgement in input schemes
reviews.comment: The dev has great taste in music!  It definitely needs proper twin-sticks controller support, though. Android has controller support out of the box since Honeycomb. Android gaming will go exactly nowhere if it isn\'t enabled in games by default.
reviews.author: Bj\303\266rn-Falko Andreas

reviews.title: Was great on XBOX 360.  Spectacular on my phone!
reviews.comment: Runs perfectly on my Galaxy S III!  Super glad I can play this during slow periods at work.  I\'ve always loved this game and I\'m sure you will, too!
reviews.author: Joseph Corrales

reviews.title: I know this is a good game but...
reviews.comment: I downloaded it and paid for it and it won\'t pull up on my Huawei phone it keeps loading and then goes back to my main screen what should I do?
reviews.author: Matthew White

reviews.title: Sweet app
reviews.comment: So creative, i love it. I hope google helps devs out soon so u can use my google play songs. Love the visuals. Its just awesome!
reviews.author: Avi Kahn

reviews.title: Think it through..
reviews.comment: Put the game on GOOGLE play store... No GOOGLE music sync!?
reviews.author: Manraj Chahal

reviews.title: Well worth it
reviews.comment: I have purchased this game 5 times on every os/system that I use that it is available on and never been disappointed.
reviews.author: Chris Moers

reviews.title: Cant get pass the error
reviews.comment: Everytime i launch the app, it will be on the loading screen and when it is done loading, instead of going to the menu screen. I get a error message and the app force close after i click ok button (only button it will let me press) even reinstalling the app didnt fix this  Please fix this, i love the game.  Running on Asus Transformer Infinity TF700T. The OS is 4.2.1 using a app launcher NOVA (I dought the launcher has anything to do with the error but just in case)
reviews.author: Robert Robinson

reviews.title: simple and addictive
reviews.comment: Great game for passing those dull, pesky moments, also makes music more fun.
reviews.author: Will Lowe

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This game is one of the best games out on android as we speak! Buy it and you won\'t regret it... Unless u have no music on your phone!
reviews.author: Nadiim Sahebally

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Seriously addictive, visuals look great and it\'s challenging without being impossible. Worth the money
reviews.author: Eliott Shannon

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: Please add support for folder search like PC counterpart.My musics aren\'t showing up at all even I already tried all the suggestion in online help
reviews.author: Fiedely Halim

reviews.title: Crash when reading music
reviews.comment: Love the pc version, but this version crashes every time I try to pick a song. This makes it unplayable, notified the dev months ago still no fix.  Please fix this game!  I want to play beat hazard on my android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game. Even better potential
reviews.comment: Devs pls make more modes. Online sorta play and just diversify the game as a whole. It\'s very awesome but could do with more. Effects features and modes. If not its not as fun bodied as it could be. Let\'s not make something on its way to greatness stop ever so short of its deserved glory.
reviews.author: Nicholas Hee

reviews.title: Usually good, but
reviews.comment: ...after updating to 4.2.3, there is no sound at all, the visualizers don\'t seem to work neither, and in game the music won\'t start, and the ship obviously doesn\'t shoot.
reviews.author: Patrick N\303\266n\303\241me

reviews.title: Cursed.
reviews.comment: I was very happy with this game at first, but five days after installing it, a pale Japanese girl emerged from my screen and dragged me down a bottomless well into a pit of unfathomable darkness and horror, and I\'m all like, \"Refund please.\"
reviews.author: Ian Bennett
